# Sirajul Islam

SQA Automation Engineer & SDET specializing in scalable test frameworks, performance testing, and quality assurance strategies.

## About
Sirajul Islam is an expert in Software Quality Assurance with deep knowledge in automation (Selenium, Cypress, Playwright), CI/CD pipelines, and performance engineering. He builds robust testing infrastructure for scalable applications.

## Key Skills
- **Automation**: Cypress, Playwright, Selenium, Appium
- **Languages**: JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, Java
- **Tools**: Jenkins, GitHub Actions, Docker, Kubernetes
- **Performance**: JMeter, K6

## Contact
- GitHub: https://github.com/sirajul-islam
- LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/in/sirajul-islam-qa

## Website Structure
- `/`: Home (Portfolio, Skills, Experience)
- `/blog`: Technical articles and tutorials
- `/studio`: Admin CMS (Authorized access only)

This website is built with Next.js 16, Sanity CMS v3, and Tailwind CSS.
